bibl.title: Jewish Personal Names in Some Non-Literary Sources.

series.title: Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums.

bibl.note: The non-literary sources are those papyri and inscriptions that deal with Jewish persons or affairs.
bibl.seg: MUSSIES Gerard, Jewish Personal Names in Some Non-Literary Sources.
Jan Willem VAN HENTEN and Pieter Willem VAN DER HORST (Edd.), Studies in Early Jewish Epigraphy = Arbeiten zur Geschichte des antiken Judentums und des Urchristentums. 21 (Leiden, 1994) pp. 242-276.
The non-literary sources are those papyri and inscriptions that deal with Jewish persons or affairs.
